name: messages
code_text1:
With our 2-Step Verification, you can rest assured that the election data is secure.
To access this option, you'll simply need to enter a unique five-digit code, adding
an extra layer of protection to your election process. So whether you're accessing
sensitive data or simply want to ensure the safety of election records, our
2-Step Verification has got you covered.
make_sure:
Please ensure that all candidate information is accurate and complete before proceeding to the
next step. Once the nomination list is generated, no modifications i.e (updates, deletions, or additions)
can be made to the candidate data.
final_list:
Kindly select  the sequence of the category in which you prefer the categories to be 
displayed during the election.
re_result:
Are you sure you want to regenerate the result?
Regenerating the result will overwrite the existing data.
 Are you certain you want to proceed?
